pis_title: Exterior Latex Paint – Product Information Sheet (PIS)

titles.title: Weatherproof | UV Resistant | Fade-Resistant
titles.premium: Dirt-Resistant | Great Coverage | Water-Based (Solvent Free) | Easy to Wash (Stain Resistant) | Eco Friendly | Long-lasting Glow
titles.title2: Premium Exterior Protection for Designer Facades

product_overview: Premium fade-resistant paint for prestige building exteriors.
short_description: Long-lasting colour even under harsh sunlight.
positioning: CalmXterior preserves your design intent with fade-resistant colour and refined finishes for facades.

features_benefits.benefit: Repels moisture and prevents rain damage
Protects colour vibrancy from sun exposure
Keeps surfaces looking clean with minimal effort
Low VOC, safer for people and the environment
Easy to clean tools with water, low odour

recommended_use.intro: Ideal for high-end residential and architectural exterior applications.

application_system.label: Surface Preparation
application_system.purpose: Ensure the surface is dust-free, clean, and dry

application_system.label: Primer Coat
application_system.purpose: Improves adhesion and provides uniform absorption

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Apply 2 coats for full weather and UV protection

technical_data.Binder Type: High gloss acrylic with anti-fade pigments

surface_preparation: Ensure surface is dry, clean, and dust-free
Scrape off loose paint, chalking, or flaking material
Use primer on absorbent or repaired surfaces
application: Apply evenly using brush, roller, or spray

limitations.Protection Period: Do not expose freshly painted surface to rain for at least 48 hrs
limitations.Application Conditions: Avoid painting during rain, frost, or high humidity
limitations.Not Recommended For: Interior use, damp or unprepared surfaces

storage_safety: Store in tightly closed containers in a dry place
Keep away from direct sunlight and frost
Keep away from food, drinks, and children

safety_first_aid.General: Avoid prolonged contact with skin and eyes
safety_first_aid.Skin Contact: Wash immediately with soap and water
safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Flush with clean water for 15 minutes and seek medical advice
safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Ensure adequate ventilation; move to fresh air if discomfort occurs
safety_first_aid.Ingestion: Do not induce vomiting; seek medical attention immediately
safety_first_aid.Waste Disposal: Dispose of waste paint responsibly as per local regulations

environmental_commitment: Low-VOC, eco-friendly formulation reduces environmental impact while delivering long-lasting performance. Designed for sustainable architecture with easy disposal and minimal carbon footprint.

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply using brush, roller, or spray on a dry, dust-free surface
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Clean surface and remove loose material before painting
specs_summary.safety_precautions: Use gloves and mask; avoid contact with skin and eyes
specs_summary.storage_instructions: Keep sealed in cool, dry place away from sunlight
